sect2.title: Linking
sect2.para: Here we show how to create true hyperlinks to resources on the web, such as Google or a plain URL without alternative text

Now, we will reference a figure from the previous chapter,. Note that when doing such a reference, it is best to target something which had a "title" element, as that will become the display text for your link. Note also it is good writing practice to never use positional text (i.e. "the figure below" or "the figure on the next page") as you do not know where the images will ultimatly be placed relative to the text.
